content: useful to pull a piece of scrap contrast yarn through the final stitch of the round as a marker or use a stitch marker ch1 here before starting the pattern rounds after this you will not ch1 between rounds unless instructed to round 5 double_crochet blo in every st round 6 double_crochet in every st round 7 double_crochet blo in every st turn your work the inside of the cowl will now be facing towards you round 8 puff double_crochet around slip_stitch to top of first puff 55 puffs and 55 double_crochet turn your work ch1 rnds 9 - 32 repeat rounds 5-8 six more times rnds 33- 34 repeat rounds 5-6 once more crochetscot- the cowl with no name change to 3 5mm hook round 35 half_double_crochet in blo in every st round 36 ch2 does not count as a st fphtr around next st bphtr around the next st repeat around slip_stitch to top of ch2 rnds 37-38 repeat round 36 fasten_off and sew in ends measurements circumference 66cm depth 22cm yarn used king cole comfort 310m/100g 98g used = 304m i d love to see your finished projects please tag me on instagram @crochetscot and add #crochetscot to your posts thanks enjoy wearing your lovely new cowl
